alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 16 at 2:00PM EDT until May 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Bourbon County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Nicholas County in central Kentucky... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 200 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located near Sideview, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... North Middletown, Plum, East Union, and Little Rock. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
